columns.name: sku
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product (Stock Keeping Unit).

columns.name: national_inv
columns.description: National inventory level for the product.

columns.name: lead_time
columns.description: Lead time in days to restock the product.

columns.name: sales_last_month
columns.description: Number of units sold in the previous month.

columns.name: sales_last_year
columns.description: Number of units sold in the same month of the previous year.

columns.name: forecast_3_month
columns.description: Forecasted sales for the next 3 months.

columns.name: forecast_6_month
columns.description: Forecasted sales for the next 6 months.

columns.name: forecast_9_month
columns.description: Forecasted sales for the next 9 months.

columns.name: min_bank
columns.description: Minimum quantity that should be in stock to meet demand without backorders.

columns.name: perf_6_month_avg
columns.description: Supplier’s performance score over the last 6 months.

columns.name: perf_12_month_avg
columns.description: Supplier’s performance score over the last 12 months.

columns.name: local_bo_qty
columns.description: Local backorder quantity (number of units on backorder locally).

columns.name: deck_risk
columns.description: Whether there is a risk of stock depletion (inventory dropping below safety stock level).

columns.name: oe_constraint
columns.description: Whether the product is under operational constraints (e.g., limited supply).

columns.name: ppap_risk
columns.description: Whether the product has a risk related to Production Part Approval Process.

columns.name: stop_auto_buy
columns.description: Whether automatic purchasing of the product is disabled.

columns.name: rev_stop
columns.description: Whether sales of the product are restricted or stopped.

columns.name: went_on_backorder
columns.description: Target column indicating if the product went on backorder (True for yes, False for no).
